Assassin Master:
All Villages from fire nation fighting with assassins:
Leaf (Konoha-Gakure) - Isle of Prayer Mobs. Grass (Kusa-Gakure) - Forge of The Gods Higher Level. Fog (Kiri-Gakure) - Valley of Saints. Sand (Suna-Gakure) - Forest of Dead Day. Snow (Yuki-Gakure) - Forge of The Gods Higher Level. Waterfall (Taki-Gakure) - Wall of Argos. Sound (Oto-Gakure) - Imperial Tomb.
When you kill mobs from that terrain, assassins appear and you must kill these assassins and collect killing points for self and for your village.
